title: Costa Rica
subtitle: Surf. Raft. Hike. Kayak. Zipline. More.
short_description: Hike through majestic jungles with gorgeous waterfalls & wildlife. Ride class IV rapids down every twist and turn of the Pacuare. Zipline above the canopy for exhilarating jungle views. Mountain bike. Go canyoning. Snorkel, surf, and bodyboard the warm waters of the Caribbean. Kick back in a stunning tropical bed & breakfast with volcano views.
